verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is my <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is my <S%H1916>footstool:<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye <S%H1129>build<s%> unto me? and <S%H335>where<s%> is <S%H2088>the<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4496>rest?<s%>

For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> things hath mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> things have <S%H1961>been,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> man will I <S%H5027>look,<s%> even <S%H413>to<s%> him that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and of a <S%H5223>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and <S%H2730>trembleth<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H1697>word.<s%>

He that <S%H7819>killeth<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> is as if he <S%H5221>slew<s%> a <S%H376>man;<s%> he that <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> as if he cut off a dog's <S%H6202>neck;<s%> <S%H3611><s%> he that <S%H5927>offereth<s%> an <S%H4503>oblation,<s%> as if he offered <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> he that <S%H2142>burneth<s%> <S%H3828>incense,<s%> as if he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> an <S%H205>idol.<s%> <S%H1571>Yea,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> have <S%H977>chosen<s%> their own <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in their <S%H8251>abominations.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H977>choose<s%> their <S%H8586>delusions,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H4035>fears<s%> upon them; <S%H3282>because<s%> when I <S%H7121>called,<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H6030>answer;<s%> when I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> they did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear:<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> before mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> that in <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H2654>delighted<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> ye that <S%H2730>tremble<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> his <S%H1697>word;<s%> Your <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H8130>hated<s%> you, that cast you <S%H5077>out<s%> for my name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H3513>glorified:<s%> but he shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> to your <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7588>noise<s%> from the <S%H4480>city,<s%> <S%H5892><s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H4480>temple,<s%> <S%H1964><s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H7999>rendereth<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Before <S%H2962><s%> she <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> she brought <S%H3205>forth;<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> her <S%H2256>pain<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> she was <S%H4422>delivered<s%> of a man <S%H2145>child.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> such a <S%H2063>thing?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> such <S%H428>things?<s%> Shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be made to bring <S%H2342>forth<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%> or shall a <S%H1471>nation<s%> be <S%H3205>born<s%> at <S%H259>once?<s%> <S%H6471><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> as <S%H1571>soon<s%> as <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> she brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1121>children.<s%>

Shall <S%H589>I<s%> bring to the <S%H7665>birth,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> cause to bring <S%H3205>forth?<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> shall <S%H589>I<s%> cause to bring <S%H3205>forth,<s%> and <S%H6113>shut<s%> the womb? <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> ye <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and be <S%H1523>glad<s%> with her, <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that <S%H157>love<s%> her: <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> for <S%H4885>joy<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> her, <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that <S%H56>mourn<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her:

That <S%H4616><s%> ye may <S%H3243>suck,<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H4480>breasts<s%> <S%H7699><s%> of her <S%H8575>consolations;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may milk <S%H4711>out,<s%> and be <S%H6026>delighted<s%> with the <S%H4480>abundance<s%> <S%H2123><s%> of her <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5186>extend<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her like a <S%H5104>river,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> like a <S%H7857>flowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream:<s%> then shall ye <S%H3243>suck,<s%> ye shall be <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and be <S%H8173>dandled<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

As <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5162>comforteth,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you; and ye shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And when ye <S%H7200>see<s%> this, your <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H7797>rejoice,<s%> and your <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like an <S%H1877>herb:<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and with his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> like a <S%H5492>whirlwind,<s%> to <S%H7725>render<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> with <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and his <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> with <S%H3851>flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> by <S%H784>fire<s%> and by his <S%H2719>sword<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> and the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H7231>many.<s%>

They that sanctify <S%H6942>themselves,<s%> and purify <S%H2891>themselves<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H1593>gardens<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> tree in the <S%H8432>midst,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and the <S%H8263>abomination,<s%> and the <S%H5909>mouse,<s%> shall be <S%H5486>consumed<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H595>I<s%> know their <S%H4639>works<s%> and their <S%H4284>thoughts:<s%> it shall <S%H935>come,<s%> that I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H3956>tongues;<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> among them, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> those that <S%H6412>escape<s%> of <S%H4480>them<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H6322>Pul,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> that <S%H4900>draw<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> to <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> to the <S%H339>isles<s%> afar <S%H7350>off,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8088>fame,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3519>glory;<s%> and they shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> for an <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and in <S%H6632>litters,<s%> and upon <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and upon swift <S%H3753>beasts,<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them for <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6213>make,<s%> shall <S%H5975>remain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5975>remain.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1767><s%> one new <S%H2320>moon<s%> to <S%H2320>another,<s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1767><s%> one <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to <S%H7676>another,<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they shall go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> upon the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> that have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me: <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H8438>worm<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall their <S%H784>fire<s%> be <S%H3518>quenched;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H1860>abhorring<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
